title: Expert Real Estate Video Editor
job_overview:
We’re hiring a highly skilled Real Estate Video Editor to craft cinematic, conversion-focused property videos. This role demands advanced color grading expertise (DLOG/SLOG footage) and flawless editing techniques. Candidates must complete a paid test edit using provided raw footage before hiring.

Non-Negotiable Requirements:
? Advanced color grading – Mastery in correcting/grading flat profiles (DLOG, SLOG, etc.) for vibrant, natural tones.
? Seamless transitions – Dynamic yet tasteful cuts (speed ramps, masked transitions, etc.).
? Technical polish – Stabilization, noise reduction, and exposure balancing for pro-level results.
? Real estate experience – Portfolio showcasing high-end property edits (drone clips, interior scans, etc.).

Process:

Submit your portfolio/reel (focus on real estate work).

Shortlisted candidates will edit a 15-30s test clip (paid) from our raw footage.

Salary is negotiable.
